summary: Completed comprehensive testing of profile statistics fixes and navigation with query parameters. Backend correctly computes correct/wrong statistics from match data instead of raw DB 'result' field. Frontend stat cards navigate with proper query parameters and MyPredictions page correctly reads and applies URL filters with visual highlighting.
passed_tests: Backend health check (/api/health) - Status 200 with timestamp
User login (test@guessit.com) - Session token properly set
Profile bundle API (/api/profile/bundle) - Returns accurate stats: 0 correct, 2 wrong, 0% accuracy
MyPredictions detailed API (/api/predictions/me/detailed) - Summary matches Profile bundle
Profile page loads correctly with stats grid display
Stat cards show correct values: 2 Predictions, 0 Correct, 2 Wrong, 0 Points
MyPredictions page loads with summary section and filter tabs
URL filter parameter (?filter=wrong) properly highlights Wrong summary card as active
Clicking different summary cards updates URL query parameter correctly
Summary card visual highlighting (border-primary, ring-2) works as expected
Clicking 'Total' summary card removes filter parameter from URL
Recent Activity section shows proper result indicators (icons) for predictions
All navigation and filter state synchronization between Profile and MyPredictions pages
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (4/4 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all navigation and filter functionality working correctly)
